channel.title: Race Wars
channel.description: Hilarious, honest and unfiltered, Race Wars with Kurt Metzger and Sherrod Small delivers a brutally funny perspective that can't be found anywhere else. Kurt and Sherrod cut through all the layers of politically correct media spin to deliver hysterical and truthful opinions on social, racial and global topics.
